barcode.title: Barcode
barcode.description: This function allows reading a barcode from a Stencil and transcribes it to the search field.
barcode.waiting: Waiting for sensor to recognize a code...

lastMeasurement.title: Last measurement
lastMeasurement.description: Shows the date of the last measurement

lastPoints.title: Last measured points
lastPoints.description: Shows the tension value of points in the last measurement

lifeLimit.title: Estimated life limit
lifeLimit.description: Shows the estimated life limit of the Stencil

newMeasurements.title: New measurements
newMeasurements.subtitle: Choose the type of measurement you want to perform.
newMeasurements.description: Choose the type of measurement you want to perform

tension.title: Measure Tension
tension.description: This function will take you to a specific tab to perform automatic measurements, obtained by robot execution.

scratches.title: Measure Scratches
scratches.description: This function opens a modal where you need to choose the Stencil to be measured and will start the connection process with the robot and other processes and equipment.

report.title: Compliance report generation
report.description: This function generates a report regarding the compliance of the searched stencil and other measurements performed.

messages.stencilNotFoundOrNoMeasurements: Stencil not found. Or the Stencil has no scratch measurements
messages.noValuesFound: No values found for the Stencil
messages.waitingSensor: Waiting for sensor to recognize a code...
messages.networkError: Network error. There was a problem communicating with the server.
messages.stencilFoundButNoScratchMeasurements: Stencil {{partNumber}} was found, but has no scratch measurements
messages.errorFetchingData: An error occurred while fetching data. Please try again.
